text:
I have some sense of why people like to allocate memory and put things in places but I struggled with this approach even when I was young.

Learning Peek/Poke addresses on Atari BASIC seemed orthogonal to what I was trying to achieve. Of course I did it and twiddled some bits at various times. But it never seemed "simple."

Then in college I was introduced to Lisp and it really clicked. I share this because I always found it funny how different minds come to determine the meaning of simple.
